MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.10pm to carry out a safe excavation due to a faulty underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.45pm on Thursday 22nd October 2020.
